name: Sugar Rush (itch) (Two Pigs)
description:
Sugar Rush is an endless runner portraying your escape from the sugar container (Yes, you are the sugar cube).  Avoid obstacles on your way to the end of the dining table!

Simple Controls: Up Arrow Key & "Z"

Game Dev: Tsucchi
Visuals: Pikayau

Links to Audio used:
Background Music - https://freesound.org/people/Bruno_ph/sounds/109407/
Next Score - https://freesound.org/people/Christopherderp/sounds/342200/
